modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod doubles the effects of mother lode (also adds an extra 33% with no levels in Mother Lode). Compatible with Alpha 18.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod doubles the effects of mother lode (also adds an extra 33% with no levels in [Mother Lode](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-perks/)). Compatible with Alpha 18, havenâ€™t checked to see if it is really double and still adds 33% with no levels, will update this when Luc does that.
